column1: #text=My history teacher have us an assignment to do a research paper on World War II .
#text=I needed to gather information so I headed to the school library to do research .
#text=I found many helpful books in the history section of the library and sat down to do my research .
#text=A few hours later and the library is about to close but I 'm not finished with my work so I decided to borrow the history books .
#text=I gathered the books and headed to the librarian .
#text=I handed her the books I wanted to borrow along with my library card .
#text=She then scans my library card and each book .
#text=The machine starts printing out the date of when the books are due .
#text=The librarian hands me back the books , library card , and due date .
#text=I take the books home to do further research for my history assignment that 's due next week .
